# galaxy_redshift_catalog (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `auth_type` (String)
- `endpoint` (String) Redshift cluster endpoint
- `name` (String) Catalog name
- `read_only` (Boolean) Is catalog read only

### Optional

- `access_key` (String)
- `description` (String) Catalog description
- `id` (String) A catalog connecting to AWS Redshift
- `password` (String)
- `region` (String) AWS region
- `role_arn` (String) AWS cross account role ARN
- `secret_key` (String)
- `ssh_tunnel_id` (String) SSH tunnel identifier
- `username` (String) Username
- `validate` (Boolean) Validate catalog configuration before creation

### Read-Only

- `catalog_id` (String) Redshift catalog identifier (read only)
